Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Spacious and comfortable cabin equipped with one double bed, private bathroom with shower and bath products, satellite TV, fridge, air-conditioning, radio and dressing table. Located on the boat deck, its four panoramic windows offer a great view of the landscapes.
Boat deck 1 double bed - Suit

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Cabin equipped with one single bed, private bathroom with shower and bath products, air-conditioning, radio and fridge. It is located on the boat deck.
Boat deck 1 single bed

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Cabin equipped with two beds, private bathroom with shower and bath products, air-conditioning, radio and fridge. It is located on the boat deck.
Boat deck 2 beds

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Cabin equipped with four single beds (2 low beds and 2 high beds), private bathroom with shower and bath products, air-conditioning, radio, fridge and 2 portholes. It is located on the middle deck.

Georgy Chicherin
The Georgy CHICHERIN cruises on the Volga River.

Description.Title: Conveniences
Description.Text:
All cabins face the water (approx. 96 sq. ft.) and have low berths, private bathroom with shower, air conditioning, radio, panoramic window (except Lower Deck cabins: 2 portholes per cabin).
1 Suite: Cabin with large bed and a living area, TV/video (approx. 215 sq. ft.)

MAIN DECK

Description.Title: RESTAURANT
Description.Text: Located on the main deck, the restaurant is where all meals are served during your cruise. A delightful experience of traditional and Vietnamese cuisine with menus designed by a local executive chef.
UPPER DECK

Description.Title: LOUNGE BAR
Description.Text: The sun deck of the boat offers a panoramic view of the landscape's beauty as you cruise. A great place to relax outdoors and enjoy the weather sipping a glass of wine.

Description.Title: SUN DECK
Description.Text: Do not miss it to unwind ! It is equipped with recliners and deck chairs, so that you can enjoy the best views of your cruise.
SUN DECK

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Spacious and comfortable cabin equipped with two beds (with optional twin-bed configuration), private bathroom with shower and bath products, telephone, satellite TV, safe, hairdryer, air-conditioning, radio and wardrobe with hangers. Located at the main deck it offers a panoramic view.
Main deck 2 beds

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Spacious and comfortable cabin equipped with two beds (with optional twin-bed configuration), private bathroom with shower and bath products, telephone, satellite TV, safe, hairdryer, air-conditioning, radio and wardrobe with hangers. Located at the main deck it offers a panoramic view.
Main deck 2 beds

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Spacious and comfortable cabin equipped with two beds (with optional twin-bed configuration), private bathroom with shower and bath products, telephone, satellite TV, safe, hairdryer, air-conditioning, radio and wardrobe with hangers. Located at the main deck it offers a panoramic view.
Upper deck 2 beds
RV Indochine
RV Indochine sails on the Mekong.

Description.Title: Conveniences
Description.Text:
The RV Indochine cabins are spacious (16 square meters), comfortable and luminous with their two big windows.

Equipments :
All outside cabins, bathroom: washbasin and shower separated, toilets,separable beds air conditioning, safe, hairdryer, dressing table Bathrobes, towels and sandals at your disposal.

Description.Title: Legend
Description.Text:
The Undeniable European Leader in the Cruise Industry:
- 40 years of experience, 43 ships: CroisiEurope is the European frontrunner of river cruises
- A wide variety of choices: The French canals, European rivers, ocean tours, and exotic destinations (Europe, Africa, Russia, and Asia) with small-scale, hi-tech ships accommodating 24 to 200 passengers
- Exclusive destinations include: The Loire, Guadalquivir, and Tisza Rivers—as well as "Paris by Night” on the Seine
- Themed cruises: Gastronomic, music, hiking, golf and family
- Warm, international ambiance with La French Touch. Our motto: Highest quality at the best price.

 

CroisiEurope's Highlights:
- Drinks included with onboard meals and at bar
- Free Wi-Fi
- Copious, first-rate buffet breakfasts and traditional dining
- Individual visits excursions or reduced all-included package prices; headsets included
- Specially themed evenings: crew shows, traditional entertainment; gala dinner.

The MS KRONSTADT sails on the Volga River.

Description.Title: Legend
Description.Text: This ideally-sized standard + rated ship allows you to fully enjoy your cruise in a friendly atmosphere. The large sundeck provides a clear view of the wonderful scenery as we gently sail along the river.

Description.Title: Cabins description

Description.Title: Cabins description

Upper deck 2 beds

Description.Title: Cabins description

RV Indochine II
RV Indochine II sails on the Mekong River.

Description.Title: Conveniences
Description.Text:
Cabins are spacious and comfortable, with plenty of light (22,5 m²) including a private balcony (4 m²). Cabins 201, 202, 221 and 224 come with 6 m² mini-terraces.
Conveniences: All cabins are exterior-facing and equipped with two low beds that can be joigned together, large storage space and TV, private bathroom with shower, air-conditioning, safe, hairdryer, dresser. Toiletries are available for your use. Onboard Wi-Fi.

Description.Title: Image slider
Description.Text: Image Slider

Description.Title: SPA AND MASSAGE ROOM
Description.Text: A spa and a massage room are available on the lower deck.

Description.Title: SUN DECK
Description.Text: Take advantage of the sun deck to relax! It is equipped with chairs and deckchairs, allowing you to cool off while enjoying a panoramic view of the magnificent landscapes.

Description.Title: SALON BAR
Description.Text: Enjoy our bar / lounge, a friendly place to relax and share a moment with fellow passengers and enjoy live music.

Description.Title: RESTAURANT
Description.Text:
During the cruise, enjoy your meals in the restaurant located on the upper deck where you’ll get to taste traditional dishes made by a local chef.
A VIP restaurant is also waiting for you on the sun deck, reserved for executive and presidential suites only.

Description.Title: INDOOR POOL
Description.Text: Enjoy the pool located on the lower deck.

Description.Title: MOVIE
Description.Text: A movie theater awaits you on the lower deck.

Description.Title: SHOPS
Description.Text: Enjoy the many onboard shops located on the promenade and wheelhouse bridges.

Description.Title: LIBRARY
Description.Text: Relax in the library located on the sun deck. You'll find many books and board games.

Description.Title: LAUNDRY
Description.Text: Laundry service is available on board.

Description.Title: RECEPTION
Description.Text: Perfect place to meet with friends before excursions or to ask any information you may need to the staff. The Gift Shop is also located here, you'll find a wide assortment of souvenirs, CroisiEurope products and post cards.

Description.Title: SPORTS HALL
Description.Text: A sport hall is at your disposal on the sun deck.

Description.Title: CYBERCAFE
Description.Text: A cybercafe is available 24 hours a day.
CABINE DECK

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Spacious and comfortable suite equipped with a bedroom with a large bed and private bathroom (shower, bath, private toilet and toiletries), hairdryer, flat screen TV, dressing table, minibar, safe, plenty of storage space, spacious lounge with sofas, desk and dining areas, and air-conditioning with individual control. Located on the promenade deck, its private balcony (30 m² / 322 ft²) and panoramic window offer a great view of the landscapes.
Presidential Suite

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text:
Spacious and comfortable cabin equipped with two single beds that can be joined together, private bathroom (shower, private toilet and toiletries), hairdryer, flat-screen TV, dressing table, minibar, safe, many storage space and air conditioning with individual control. Located on the main deck, its balcony and panoramic window offer a great view of the landscapes.

  • 156 Deluxe cabins located on the main, upper, promenade and wheelhouse decks
CATEGORY 1- Deluxe Cabine

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text:
Spacious and comfortable suite equipped with two single beds that can be joined together, private bathroom (shower, private toilet and toiletries), hairdryer, flat-screen TV, dressing table, minibar, safe, many storage space and air conditioning with individual control. Its balcony and panoramic window offer a great view of the landscapes.

  • 34 Executive Suites are located on the observation and sun decks.
CATEGORY 2 - Executive Suite
MS Century Legend
Your luxurious Legend ship allows you to sail on the 3rd largest river in the world, the Yangtze Kiang River nicknamed the "blue river", cradle of Chinese civilization.

Description.Title: Conveniences
Description.Text:
• Safe
  • Mini bar
  • Hair dryer
  • Flat-screen TV
  • Bathrobes and sandals
  • Air conditioning with individual control
  • Private balcony

Description.Title: Image slider
Description.Text: Image Slider

Description.Title: 8 cabins
Description.Text: • 8 cabins, including 2 cabins with balconies
MAIN DECK

Description.Title: RESTAURANT
Description.Text: The restaurant is where all meals are served during your cruise. It seats all guests at tables which vary in size with a panoramic view. The atmosphere is casual but elegant.

Description.Title: RECEPTION DESK
Description.Text: Ideal place to meet before departures of visits or to obtain information from the personnel of board. The souvenir shop is also there, you will find postcards, souvenirs and practical articles.

Description.Title: LOUNGE BAR
Description.Text: Panoramic lounge providing an ideal view of the surrounding landscapes.

Description.Title: JACUZZI
Description.Text: Rest and relax in the Jacuzzi while enjoying the beautiful landscapes.
UPPER DECK

Description.Title: SUN DECK
Description.Text: A sun deck with 360 wrap-around view for an immersive experience at the heart of the wilderness. At night, this deck is a perfect place for stargazing.
SUN DECK

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Spacious and comfortable cabin equipped with two single beds that can be joined together, a balcony, private bathroom with shower and bath products, telephone, satellite TV, safe, hairdryer, air-conditioning, radio and wardrobe with hangers. Located on the main deck, it offers a panoramic view. A spare bed (150cm x 80cm ; 59 in. x 31 in.) is available for a third person from 7 up to 14 years old.
Twin Room with 1 spare bed (150cm x 80cm)

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: This cabin can't be booked.
Main deck 1 single bed

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Spacious and comfortable cabin equipped with two single beds that can be joined together and a French balcony, private bathroom with shower and bath products, telephone, satellite TV, safe, hairdryer, air-conditioning, radio and wardrobe with hangers. Located on the main deck, it offers a panoramic view.
Main deck 2 adjustable twin beds

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Spacious and comfortable cabin with two single beds that can be joined together, with a bathroom (sink, private shower and toilet, towels provided), hairdryer, satellite TV, safe and radio. Located on the main deck, its balcony (approx. 3.5m²) offers a panoramic view on the landscapes.
Main deck 2 adjustable twin beds with balcony
African Dream

CroisiEurope offers you an up-close and personal experience with nature at the ends of the world on board our new Premium-rated ship as we sail along Lake Kariba and the most beautiful bends of the region for fantastic views of the surrounding wonderland.

Description.Title: Conveniences
Description.Text:
• Safe
  • Air-conditioning
  • 220V voltage and adapters for most countries
  • TV
  • Hairdryer
  • Welcome basket
  • Lounge chairs and exterior sofas
  • Binoculars can be loaned (limited availability)

CABIN FOR TRIPLE USE ON BOARD THE AFRICAN DREAM
If two adults and one child are sharing one cabin, the spare bed will measure 150cm x 80cm (59 in. x 31 in.).

Zimbabwean Dream

Description.Title: Image slider
Description.Text: Image Slider

Description.Title: RESTAURANT
Description.Text: Enjoy delicious meals cooked with fresh local products. Located on the main deck, this spacious restaurant offers great views with its large panoramic windows. Whilst breakfast and lunch are served buffet style, dinner will be on plate service basis.

Description.Title: 10 suites
Description.Text: • 10 "Signature" suites
MAIN DECK

Description.Title: 18 suites
Description.Text:
• 13 "Colonial" suites
  • 2 "Heritage" suites
  • 2 "Viceroy" suites
  • 1 "Maharaja" suite
UPPER DECK

Description.Title: TERRACE
Description.Text: Take advantage of the terrace to relax or share a moment with friends! It is equipped with deckchairs and offers great views of the landscapes.

Description.Title: GYM
Description.Text: It is equipped with a treadmill, an exercise bike and an elliptical bike.

Description.Title: SPA
Description.Text: It is equipped with 2 body care rooms where you can choose between a wide selection of Indian or international treatments.

Description.Title: LOUNGE / BAR
Description.Text: Perfect place to enjoy some delicious cocktails as well as Indian and international wines while enjoying the views on the Ganges River.

Description.Title: YOGA CLASSES
Description.Text: Start your day with our yoga classes occurring every morning.
SUN DECK

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Located on the main deck, these suites are equipped with a small sitting area, large window, 2 beds that can be separated, a bathroom with robes, slippers and bath products, safe, hairdryer, flat-screen TV and individual air conditioning.
¿SIGNATURE¿ SUITE

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Located on the upper deck, these suites are equipped with a small sitting area, a French balcony, 2 beds that can be separated, a bathroom with robes, slippers and bath products, safe, hairdryer, flat-screen TV and individual air conditioning.
¿COLONIAL¿ SUITE

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text:
Located on the upper deck, these suites are equipped with a sitting area and writing desk, a French balcony offering a panoramic view, Persian rugs, one king size canopy bed, a bathroom with robes, slippers and bath products, safe, hairdryer, flat-screen TV and individual air conditioning.

  • Additional services (on request): choice of bath products, shoe cleaning service, breakfast delivered to your suite, assistance with the preparation of your luggage.
¿VICEROY¿ SUITE

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Located on the upper deck, these suites are equipped with a small sitting area and writing desk, a French balcony offering a panoramic view, one king size canopy bed, a bathroom with robes, slippers and bath products, safe, hairdryer, flat-screen TV and individual air conditioning.
¿HERITAGE¿ SUITE

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text:
Located on the upper deck, these suites are equipped with a sitting area and writing desk, a French balcony offering a panoramic view, Persian rugs, one king size canopy bed, a bathroom with spacious bathtub and shower panels, robes, slippers and bath products, safe, hairdryer, flat-screen TV with a wide selection of on-demand movies and individual air conditioning.

  • Additional services (on request): choice of bath products, shoe cleaning service, breakfast delivered to your suite, assistance with the preparation of your luggage.
¿MAHARAJA¿ SUITE
GANGES VOYAGER

Enjoy a luxurious experience on board the Ganges Voyager which brings back memories from a bygone era. Discover the Indian subcontinent and its history in the British colonial atmosphere of the most comfortable ship sailing on the Ganges River.

Description.Title: Conveniences
Description.Text:
• Free Wi-Fi in all lounges (where signal is available)
  • Air conditioning
  • Library and board games
  • Onboard meals are cooked with local products (vegetarian option for all meals)

Description.Title: DESCRIPTION_MARKETING
Description.Text:
The Undeniable European Leader in the Cruise Industry:
- More than 40 years of experience, more than 50 ships: CroisiEurope is the European frontrunner of river cruises
- A wide variety of choices: The French canals, European rivers, ocean tours, and exotic destinations (Africa, Russia, and Asia) with small-scale, hi-tech ships accommodating 16 to 200 passengers
- Exclusive destinations include: The Loire, Guadalquivir, and Tisza Rivers—as well as “Paris by Night” on the Seine, or Lake Kariba...
- Themed cruises: Gastronomic, music, hiking, biking and family
- Warm, international ambiance with La French Touch. Our motto: Highest quality at the best price.

CroisiEurope’s Highlights:
- Drinks included with onboard meals and at bar (depending on the cruise)
- Free Wi-Fi
- Copious, first-rate buffet breakfasts and fine French dining
- Individual visits excursions or reduced all-included package prices; headsets included (depending on the cruise)
- Specially themed evenings: traditional entertainment; gala dinner.

Description.Title: GIFT SHOP
Description.Text: You can find postcards, souvenirs and handy items in the souvenir shop.

Description.Title: RESTAURANT
Description.Text: Located on the Nile deck, the restaurant is where all meals are served during your cruise for a delightful experience of local and international cuisine.

Description.Title: 4 cabins
Description.Text: • 4 double cabins
NILE DECK

Description.Title: 20 cabins
Description.Text:
• 18 double cabins
  • 2 suites
MAIN DECK

Description.Title: 24 cabins

Description.Title: SWIMMING POOL / JACUZZI
Description.Text: Rest and relax in the swimming pool or the Jacuzzi while enjoying the beautiful landscapes.

Description.Title: UPPER SUN DECK
Description.Text: Take advantage of the upper sun deck to admire the panoramic view of the magnificent landscapes! It is equipped with deckchairs and 2 exercise bikes.

Description.Title: MASSAGE AREA
Description.Text: Enjoy pure moments of rest and relaxation in our massage area.
UPPER SUN DECK

Description.Title: LOUNGE / BAR
Description.Text: Relax in this observation lounge and enjoy the panoramic views with a cocktail in hand.

Description.Title: LIBRARY / BOARD GAMES
Description.Text: Relax in the intimate atmosphere of this lounge equipped with comfortable sofas. Take advantage of the library or the available board games to share a moment with friends.
SUN DECK

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Cabins equipped with private bathroom including restroom and shower, air conditioning, large storage spaces, wardrobe, hairdryer, safe and Satellite TV. They offer great views on the Nile River thanks to their panoramic windows (they cannot be opened on this deck).
NILE DECK - 2 ADJUSTABLE TWIN BEDS

Description.Title: DESCRIPTION_MARKETING
Description.Text:
The Undeniable European Leader in the Cruise Industry:
- More than 40 years of experience, more than 50 ships: CroisiEurope is the European frontrunner of river cruises
- A wide variety of choices: The French canals, European rivers, ocean tours, and exotic destinations (Africa, Russia, and Asia) with small-scale, hi-tech ships accommodating 16 to 200 passengers
- Exclusive destinations include: The Loire, Guadalquivir, and Tisza Rivers—as well as “Paris by Night” on the Seine, or Lake Kariba...
- Themed cruises: Gastronomic, music, hiking, biking and family
- Warm, international ambiance with La French Touch. Our motto: Highest quality at the best price.

CroisiEurope’s Highlights:
- Drinks included with onboard meals and at bar (depending on the cruise)
- Free Wi-Fi
- Copious, first-rate buffet breakfasts and fine French dining
- Individual visits excursions or reduced all-included package prices; headsets included (depending on the cruise)
- Specially themed evenings: traditional entertainment; gala dinner.

Description.Title: Image slider
Description.Text: Image slider

Description.Title: RESTAURANT
Description.Text: Located on the main deck, the restaurant is where all meals are served during your cruise. It seats all guests at tables which vary in size with a panoramic view. The atmosphere is casual but elegant.

Description.Title: 18 cabins
Description.Text: • 18 double cabins
MAIN DECK

Description.Title: LOUNGE BAR WITH DANCEFLOOR
Description.Text: The lounge tastefully decorated, is located at the front of the ship and offers panoramic views. Cocktails and games, dancing, and other forms of entertainment all happen here.

Description.Title: 30 cabins
Description.Text:
• 25 double cabins
  • 4 double cabins with king size beds
  • 1 cabin for people with reduced mobility
UPPER DECK

Description.Title: FITNESS
Description.Text: Start your day by joining us for a morning fitness class on the sun deck.

Description.Title: SUN DECK
Description.Text: Take advantage of the sun deck to relax! It is equipped with chairs and deckchairs, allowing you to cool off while enjoying a panoramic view of the magnificent landscapes.
SUN DECK

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Spacious and comfortable cabin equipped with two beds that can be separated, private bathroom with shower and bath products, satellite TV, safe, hairdryer and radio. Located on the main deck, it offers a panoramic view of the landscapes.
Main deck 2 adjustable twin beds

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Spacious and comfortable cabin equipped with private balcony, one double bed, private bathroom with shower and bath products, satellite TV, safe, hairdryer and radio. Located on the upper deck, its panoramic window offers a great view of the landscapes.
Upper Deck 1 double bed

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Spacious and comfortable cabin equipped with private balcony, two beds that can be separated, private bathroom with shower and bath products, satellite TV, safe, hairdryer and radio. Located on the upper deck, its panoramic window offers a great view of the landscapes.
Upper deck 2 adjustable twin beds

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Spacious and comfortable cabin adapted for passengers with reduced mobility and equipped with private balcony, one double bed, private bathroom with shower and bath products, satellite TV, safe, hairdryer and radio. Located on the upper deck, its panoramic window offers a great view of the landscapes.
Upper Deck 1 double bed - disabled person
MS Loire Princesse
The MS Loire Princesse cruises on the Loire River between Saint-Nazaire and Angers.

Description.Title: EQUIPMENTS
Description.Text:
• TV
  • Telephone (for internal calls only)
  • Bathroom with shower and toilet
  • Towels
  • Safe
  • Independent air-conditioning
  • Electricity 220V
  • Wi-Fi

Please note that there is no laundry service on board the ship.

Description.Title: DESCRIPTION_MARKETING
Description.Text:
The Undeniable European Leader in the Cruise Industry:
- More than 40 years of experience, more than 50 ships: CroisiEurope is the European frontrunner of river cruises
- A wide variety of choices: The French canals, European rivers, ocean tours, and exotic destinations (Africa, Russia, and Asia) with small-scale, hi-tech ships accommodating 16 to 200 passengers
- Exclusive destinations include: The Loire, Guadalquivir, and Tisza Rivers—as well as “Paris by Night” on the Seine, or Lake Kariba...
- Themed cruises: Gastronomic, music, hiking, biking and family
- Warm, international ambiance with La French Touch. Our motto: Highest quality at the best price.

CroisiEurope’s Highlights:
- Drinks included with onboard meals and at bar (depending on the cruise)
- Free Wi-Fi
- Copious, first-rate buffet breakfasts and fine French dining
- Individual visits excursions or reduced all-included package prices; headsets included (depending on the cruise)
- Specially themed evenings: traditional entertainment; gala dinner.
